cards.name: Foomka Cabashada

cards.description: Loo adeegsado codsiga shahaadada Sarkaalka Ilaalinta Xogta (DPO).

awareness.title: Hel Tababar ku Saabsan Ilaalinta Xogta
awareness.desc: Dhammaan maamulayaasha xogta waa inay sanadkiiba maraan tababar shahaado leh si ay u waafaqaan sharciga.
items: Aqoon isweydaarsi fool ka fool ah

legal.title: Xigashooyinka Sharciga
